text: Mano-chan, I think you're fine just the way you are.

Because it's a gourmet show,
of course, food reporting is important...
But it's not just about conveying it in words.

Mano-chan, the moments when you're savoring it slowly,
those convey the deliciousness many times over.

...In our show, I want to capture
those genuine moments.

Haha, that's why you don't have to try too hard.
That's what the producer says, too!
Yeah... I'll do my best, but without overdoing it, okay?...
